text: William D. "Bill" Magee (June 21, 1939 - December 24, 2020) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the New York State Assembly, who represented the 121st Assembly District from 1991 until 2018. He was born in Oneida, New York. He was also a businessman. Magee died on December 24, 2020 in Nelson, New York at the age of 81.Former NY Assemblyman William Magee passes away ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Businesspeople from New York (state)
title: William Magee (politician)
